ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] News Flash!
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats :o) ... From: Mike Roach  To:  Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 9:28 AM Subject: [eqbards] News Flash!
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats :o)
----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Roach <Mike.Roach@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 9:28 AM
Subject: [eqbards] News Flash!


>
>
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:30 2000] You slash a drolvarg sentry for 4 points of
> damage.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:30 2000] Timarok pierces a drolvarg sentry for 51 points
> of damage.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:30 2000] Timarok pierces a drolvarg sentry for 37 points
> of damage.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:31 2000] a drolvarg sentry was pierced by thorns.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:31 2000] a drolvarg sentry has been slain by Gargath!
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:31 2000] You gain party experience!!
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:31 2000] You raise a level! Welcome to level 50!
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:31 2000] a drolvarg sen hits Gargath for 48 points of
> damage.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:34 2000] Your mind clears.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:34 2000] Faras's birthdate: Sun Apr 11 17:23:12 1999.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:34 2000] Total time playing Faras: 62 days, 1 hour, and
22
> minutes.
>
> [Thu Sep 07 01:26:40 2000] Your mind clears.
>
> -Faras Tar'Linedhel
